title: Advanced Social Sector Competency Development Course Through Synchronous Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: College-level basic social science knowledge and online learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended methods research-based curriculum using real-time video platforms for graduate students in social sciences, conducted in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can enhance the ability to analyze social phenomena through real-time discussions and collaborative activities in synchronous online learning environments.
Learners can achieve over 80% engagement and immersion by utilizing diverse digital tools (interactive multimedia, Zoom/Teams features).

Learners can assess the effectiveness difference between traditional and online learning within 5% through formative assessments (quizzes, discussion participation, feedback incorporation) and establish online learning strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
